metadata.title: Inteli - Innovative Selection Process
metadata.description: Take part in Inteli's selection process and enter the best technology and leadership college in Brazil. Applications open for 2025 with holistic assessment, 100% online, and adaptive tests. Get ready to transform your future!

content_blocks.text: Other entrance exams:Don't forget your pen, snack and water.
Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!

content_blocks.text: What is your future?
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!

content_blocks.text: Why is Inteli your best choice?
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Learning by doing: theory becomes a real solution
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Inteli is theonly college in Brazil with 100% project-based teaching- from the first to the last day of class. Here, you don't just study: you create, you solve, you build.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: The student is at the center of learning, developing real solutions for real companies. With a curriculum that integratesTechnology, Business and Leadership, you learn by doing - and do by learning - in an environment that mirrors the world that awaits you out there.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Projects for real companies
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Each quarter begins with a real challenge proposed by companies such as BTG Pactual, Uber, Hospital Sírio-Libanês, Volkswagen, Ambev, AACD, Google, IBM, among many others. It could be creating a robot to deliver medicines to hospitals, developing a financial fraud prevention system, or even an environmental monitoring solution via IoT for agribusiness.You receive the briefing. You study the context. Form a multidisciplinary squad. You research, prototype, make mistakes, learn, test again - until you deliver a solution with real impact.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Top marks from the MEC: excellence that gives security
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: The stage everyone wants to reach
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: From the first year, our students experiencevacation internshipsin large companies. And in the third year, they take onregular internshipswith the support of the career area, the Center for Development and Leadership.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: More than 80% of our students are already interning at companies such as Google, Amazon, Nubank, Mercado Livre, Uber, BCG, Ifood and BTG Pactual, among other giants. Here, the market recognizes talent right from the start.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Real entrepreneurship
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: At Inteli'sEntrepreneurship Center, our students have something that many people in the market dream of: direct access to investors who raise billions of reais in investment rounds and are behind some of the most innovative startups in Latin America, such as: Monashees, One VC, Atlantico, Alexia Ventures and Canastra Venture.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: If your goal is to undertake with consistency, purpose and a global vision, then this is where it all begins.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: International experience that transforms
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, the world is the classroom. As early as the first year, students can experiencevacation exchangesat partner universities around the world. And from the third year onwards, the international experience deepens withregular academic exchange programs.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: There are more than60 global connectionswith leading tech and business institutions, such as Harvard and Stanford (USA), Cambridge (UK), Technion (Israel), Universidad de Salamanca (Spain) and Zuyd (Netherlands), among many others.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Why is Inteli your best choice?

content_blocks.text: Selection process 100% about you
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Selection process 100% about you

content_blocks.text: Our Selection Process is unlike anything you've ever seen, because talent goes far beyond a test. Inspired by the American model, our assessment format is holistic and values all your potential: knowledge, background, skills and attitudes.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Selection process 100% about you

content_blocks.text: There are three complementary axes -Test, Profile and Project- in a 100% online process, carried out on our Adalove platform, to be accessible from anywhere in the world. And there's more: Inteli has created thefirst adaptive math and logic test in Brazil, which adjusts to your performance in real time. It's a unique experience!
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Selection process 100% about you

content_blocks.text: Get to know our three themes:
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Registration
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: From 5/8 to 15/10
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: In the first stage, you take part in a unique and personalized experience: the first adaptive test in Brazil. You choose how you want to take it: remotely or in person on our campus. Please note: this is the only elimination stage in the process. Challenge:Solve 20 math and logic questions within 2 hours. Access previous exams.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Profile axis
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: From 20 to 27/10
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: In the second stage, we want to get to know the person behind the candidate. Take the opportunity to include awards, extracurricular activities and personal achievements.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: ChallengeWrite two essays: one on leadership experiences and the other on a vision of the future in technology and business. You will send everything via our Adalove platform.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Project Axis
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: In the third stage, we want to get to know the leader in you. We're going to propose a topic for group discussion, and you'll have to study it until your dynamic is scheduled.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Challenge: Study the topic and present your critical thinking, communication and collaboration skills in an online group dynamic.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Important: Although the Selection Process lasts from 2 to 3 months, the estimated dedication time is approximately 10h, adding up the three stages.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Get to know our three themes:

content_blocks.text: Selection process calendar*
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Selection process calendar*

content_blocks.text: Registration opens Open class on campus Inteli Day Exam class Open class on campus Registration closes Results of the Test and opening of the Profile section Live Scholarships Closure of the Profile Axis Start of Project Axis Closing the Project Axis Announcement of the approved list (1st call) and start of registration Scholarship results announced *This calendar can be changed and updated.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Selection process calendar*

content_blocks.text: What do our students say?
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: What do our students say?

content_blocks.text: Feel the Inteli vibe
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Feel the Inteli vibe

content_blocks.text: Imagine studying in a place where creating startups, testing super-creative ideas, coding real solutions and exchanging with brilliant minds is part of the routine. And, of course, having lots of fun!
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Feel the Inteli vibe

content_blocks.text: Our campus is where innovation comes to life: a living laboratory within University City, in the heart of one of the country's biggest technology hubs. Here, you learn by doing, undertake by solving and connect with those who are transforming the world now. Inteli is your starting point.
content_blocks.section: Inteli Selection Process:Don't forget who you want to be!
content_blocks.subsection: Feel the Inteli vibe
